rows.label: qst104708_msg001
rows.name:
We were saved thanks to you. We're
going to Iyasaki Port to request
rescue, would you come with us?

rows.label: qst104708_msg0001
rows.name: So... strong...

rows.label: qst104708_msg0002
rows.name: Is everyone alright?

rows.label: qst104708_msg0003
rows.name:
Yes, of course! They are my
wonderful companions, after all.

rows.label: qst104708_msg0004
rows.name: Now then, what shall we do...

rows.label: qst104708_msg0051
rows.name: What should I say?

rows.label: qst104708_msg0052
rows.name: Yesterday's enemy is today's friend.

rows.label: qst104708_msg0053
rows.name: Those who do not work shall not eat.

rows.label: qst104708_msg0101
rows.name: That describes us perfectly!

rows.label: qst104708_msg0102
rows.name:
Rex-san from Liberalitas, the
Nopon Tora-san, and Zeke-san
from the Kingdom of Luxuria.

rows.label: qst104708_msg0103
rows.name:
And... Meleph-san from Superbia,
and Nia-ojousama from Gula.

rows.label: qst104708_msg0104
rows.name:
Those who once fought each
other are now good friends.

rows.label: qst104708_msg0105
rows.name:
You think we can do the
same? But still...

rows.label: qst104708_msg0106
rows.name:
Mother, let's go home. They
said we shouldn't be here...

rows.label: qst104708_msg0107
rows.name: Tucha...

rows.label: qst104708_msg0108
rows.name:
Father, don't bully them.
They look pitiful.

rows.label: qst104708_msg0109
rows.name:
You've come from far away, right?
Want to eat a Meaty Carrot I grew?

rows.label: qst104708_msg0110
rows.name: Really? Thank you...

rows.label: qst104708_msg0111
rows.name: Lavi... You...

rows.label: qst104708_msg0112
rows.name:
Children are far more
flexible than adults.

rows.label: qst104708_msg0113
rows.name:
These children's homeland
will one day disappear...

rows.label: qst104708_msg0114
rows.name:
I'm sorry... I didn't
understand how difficult it
is to abandon one's country.

rows.label: qst104708_msg0115
rows.name:
No, we are the ones who are sorry...
We forgot that the food we've been
eating was grown by you.

rows.label: qst104708_msg0116
rows.name: Is this case closed, I wonder?

rows.label: qst104708_msg0201
rows.name:
That's right! They didn't
come here wanting to depend
on the Gulan people.

rows.label: qst104708_msg0202
rows.name:
Everyone, please think
about what you should do
to start a new life here.

rows.label: qst104708_msg0203
rows.name:
I cannot fight with a sword, nor
can I tend to my wounded comrades.

rows.label: qst104708_msg0204
rows.name:
However, I can give my power
to my Ojousama... my Driver.

rows.label: qst104708_msg0205
rows.name: ...That's right. How about this?

rows.label: qst104708_msg0206
rows.name:
In the Imperial Capital, it was
difficult to grow crops, but...

rows.label: qst104708_msg0207
rows.name:
...my job was to research how to make
them grow even a little larger.

rows.label: qst104708_msg0208
rows.name:
I believe that by applying that
technology in the fertile land of Gula,
we can harvest more and better crops.

rows.label: qst104708_msg0209
rows.name:
Borrowing Imperial technology?
There's no way we could...

rows.label: qst104708_msg0210
rows.name: Hey, I'm growing Meaty Carrots!

rows.label: qst104708_msg0211
rows.name:
I want to make them
tastier. Can you do that?

rows.label: qst104708_msg0212
rows.name: Yes, of course.

rows.label: qst104708_msg0213
rows.name:
Yay! Hey, Father, let's
have him help us!

rows.label: qst104708_msg0214
rows.name: Lavi...

rows.label: qst104708_msg0215
rows.name:
Children are far more
flexible than adults.

rows.label: qst104708_msg0216
rows.name:
I see... You're right. We should
discuss this properly to move
in a positive direction.

rows.label: qst104708_msg0217
rows.name:
We are also sorry for making
you feel uncomfortable.

rows.label: qst104708_msg0218
rows.name:
To atone for our past disrespect,
would you allow us to cooperate?

rows.label: qst104708_msg0219
rows.name:
That's a welcome offer!
We're counting on you.

rows.label: qst104708_msg0220
rows.name: Is this case closed, I wonder?

rows.label: qst104708_msg0301
rows.name: Byakko-san, everyone, thank you.

rows.label: qst104708_msg0302
rows.name:
I heard everything from Enju...
Thank you for helping us.

rows.label: qst104708_msg0303
rows.name:
I need to become a Driver that
doesn't make Enju worry...

rows.label: qst104708_msg0320
rows.name:
Hey, Orca... If things get tough
in the future, I can carry you.

rows.label: qst104708_msg0321
rows.name: Really? But I'm pretty heavy.

rows.label: qst104708_msg0322
rows.name:
Leave it to me! I'm a Blade, so
I'm confident in my strength.

rows.label: qst104708_msg0331
rows.name:
Hey, Orca... If things get
tough in the future, I can lie
beside you to comfort you.

rows.label: qst104708_msg0332
rows.name:
Thank you, Enju... I'm sorry
for being such a pathetic Driver
who's not good at fighting.

rows.label: qst104708_msg0333
rows.name:
Don't worry about it! It just
means that you are kind.

rows.label: qst104708_msg0351
rows.name:
Well then, we should
probably be going now.

rows.label: qst104708_msg0352
rows.name: It was an honor to meet you, Enju-san.

rows.label: qst104708_msg0353
rows.name:
Likewise, Byakko-san. You have given
me a great deal of confidence.

rows.label: qst104708_msg0354
rows.name:
If we hadn't met, I'm sure
I would never have come
to like my own form.

rows.label: qst104708_msg0355
rows.name:
It's good that we could
both reaffirm the advantages
of our forms, isn't it?

rows.label: qst104708_msg0356
rows.name: Yes! Truly, thank you.
